title: Topic 001 Question 063
body: A developer is incorporating AWS X-Ray into an application that handles personal identifiable information (PII). The application is hosted on Amazon EC2 instances. The application trace messages include encrypted PII and go to Amazon CloudWatch. The developer needs to ensure that no PII goes outside of the EC2 instances.
Which solution will meet these requirements?
options: Manually instrument the X-Ray SDK in the application code.
Use Amazon Macie to detect and hide PII. Call the X-Ray API from AWS Lambda.
Use AWS Distro for Open Telemetry.
